title: Krispy Kreme Is Giving Away Free Doughnuts This Month | Letty B | KISS 95.7

organizations.name: krispy kreme rolls out new coffee blend

text:
Krispy Kreme Is Giving Away Free Doughnuts This Month 5 hours ago A photo posted by Krispy Kreme Doughnuts (@krispykreme) on Jan 29, 2017 at 4:20pm PST 
Source: Instagram 
Krispy Kreme is launching a SWEET promotion on February 6th! If you want a free original glazed doughnut all you have to do is purchase a cup of coffee and you'll receive a voucher valid until February 28th - easy enough. 
They actually just revamped their coffee and offering two new blends, smooth and rich. Both are made with 100 percent Arabica beans and will pair perfectly with that delicious glazed doughnut. 
So, if you find yourself needing a cheat day and your ready to indulge in a doughnut - this may be the way to go! Krispy Kreme Rolls Out New Coffee Blend and a Free Doughnut Deal https://t.co/6XANYsN2Jg "Doughnut-worthy" coffee officially exists. pic.twitter.com/RPn4CofGWM â€” Spoon University (@SpoonUniversity) February 1, 2017 
Source: Twitter
